thread.title: Obama goes kitesurfing with Richard Branson at private island getaway - Orlando Sentinel
thread.title_full: Obama goes kitesurfing with Richard Branson at private island getaway - Orlando Sentinel

author: orlandosentinel.com
title: Obama goes kitesurfing with Richard Branson at private island getaway - Orlando Sentinel
text:
Former President Barack Obama , and his wife, Michelle, have spent some time vacationing with Richard Branson since leaving the White House.
The Virgin Group founder put up a blog post with pictures and video of the ex-president kitesurfing off one of Branson's private islands in the British Virgin Islands. Branson writes that Obama, who's a native of Hawaii, told him he was prevented from surfing by his security detail during his time in office.
Branson says after spending a couple days learning to kitesurf, Obama bested the billionaire in a watersport challenge.
Former U.S. President Barack Obama and his wife stayed on Mosikto Island owned by Richard Branson, founder of the Virgin Group, after he finished his second term as president and left the White House.
He says inviting the Obamas to his island was "a huge honor."
Obama spent his first days after leaving Washington vacationing in Palm Springs, California.
